Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided

(the "Author"), who hopes that its promotional value

Redistributions of source code, in whole or part and with or without modification (the "Code"),
             must prominently display this GPG-signed text in verifiable form.

Redistributions of the Code in binary form must be accompanied by this GPG-signed text in any

             attribution information, which includes:

Neither the name nor any trademark of the Author may be used to endorse or promote products

Users are entirely responsible, to the exclusion of the Author and any other persons, for

             those regarding import, export, and use of encryption software.
